properties.title: Africa
properties.description:
The Africa Region covers 37 sub-Saharan countries and a population of over 800 million through 11,400 service points.

To find out more about IPPF's work in Africa, go to www.ippfar.org

properties.title: Arab World
properties.description:
The Arab World Region covers 14 countries with diverse socio-cultural challenges.

To find out more about IPPF's work in the Arab World, go to: www.ippfawr.org

properties.title: East and South East Asia and Oceania
properties.description:
The East and South East Asia and Oceania Region encompasses 22 countries and delivers services through 8,300 service points.

To find out more about IPPF's work in the region, go to: www.ippfeseaor.org

properties.title: South Asia
properties.description:
The South Asia Region covers 9 countries, including some of the most populous countries in the world, and operates nearly 19,000 service points.

To find out more about IPPF's work in South Asia, go to: www.ippfsar.org

properties.title: European Network
properties.description:
The European Network comprises 41 Member Associations in Europe and Central Asia, encompassing the EU, EU accession states and the whole of Russia.

To find out more about IPPF's work in Europe, go to: www.ippfen.org

properties.title: Western Hemisphere
properties.ro: New York, United States of America
properties.description:
The 38 countries in the Western Hemisphere Region present a variety of challenging policy environments and service delivery issues. Collectively, the Member Associations operate 25,000 service points.

To find out more about IPPF's work in this region, go to: www.ippfwhr.org
